actions.name: Comatose
actions.description: Effect: Major Status Afflictions affecting the user are reduced by 2 every Activation instead of 1. The user is always considered to be affected by the @Affliction[drowsy] Affliction for the application of attack and Ability effects. The user ignores the effects of the @Affliction[drowsy] Affliction.
